definition: lit. poultry and dogs rise to Heaven (idiom)/fig. to ride on sb else's success/Once one man gets a government position, all his cronies get in too/Once sb has cracked the problem, every Tom, Dick and Harry can do it
fowl/chicken/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(slang) prostitute
dog/Kangxi radical 94
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]
variant of 升[sheng1]
variant of 升[sheng1]/to ascend/to rise in rank
day/sky/heaven

lit. when a man achieves the Dao, his poultry and dogs rise to Heaven (idiom)/fig. to ride on sb else's success/Once one man gets a government position, all his cronies get in too/Once sb has cracked the problem, every Tom, Dick and Harry can do it
pinyin: yi1 ren2 de2 dao4 , ji1 quan3 sheng1 tian1

sentences.english: Close friends of the Mubarak government also prosper.
sentences.chinese: 穆巴拉克政府的朋友们也都鸡犬升天了。

definition: lit. when a man achieves the Dao, his poultry and dogs rise to Heaven (idiom)/fig. to ride on sb else's success/Once one man gets a government position, all his cronies get in too/Once sb has cracked the problem, every Tom, Dick and Harry can do it

definition: lit. the divine steed Feihuang gallops (idiom)/fig. to achieve meteoric success in one's career
rising straight up in a clear sky (idiom); rapid promotion to a high post/meteoric career
to rapidly go up in the world/meteoric rise (of a career, social position etc)
to bask in the light/fig. to benefit from association with sb or sth/reflected glory
When the tree topples the monkeys scatter. (idiom); fig. an opportunist abandons an unfavorable cause/Rats leave a sinking ship.
lit. when the nest is upset no egg is left intact (idiom)/fig. when one falls in disgrace the whole family is doomed

promotion to the nobility (idiom)
to bring honor to one's ancestors

lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
